channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Demopolis, 5–7 May 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Movimento 5 Stelle (EFDD): 20.9–25.2%
  • Partito Democratico (S&D): 20.0–24.2%
  • Lega Nord (EAPN): 28.7–33.4%
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 7.2–10.1%
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 4.5–6.9%
  • Più Europa (ALDE): 2.2–4.0%
